description: AMIP experiment (with SSTs and Sea Ice the same as in the amip experiment in the DECK) but with constant pre-industrial forcing levels (anthropogenic & natural) and run from 1870-present.
keywords: CFMIP, Tier 2, AMIP SST and SIC, pre-industrial forcing.
rationale: To examine whether climate feedbacks during the 20th century are different to those acting on long term climate change and climate sensitivity.
